dc:title: Communist Propaganda
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Recommends that Catholics learn from Communists how to popularize the faith through propaganda. Also encourages the use of spiritual tools to strengthen the Church in society. Mentions the crude anti-religious propaganda instituted by communists.
